name: Adult Silver Dragon
description: The Adult Silver Dragon is a massive creature with gleaming silver scales, large majestic wings, and often radiates a calming and dignified presence.
memorable: Known for its compassion and justice, it frequently takes human form to assist mortals, embodying grace and intelligence that make it a formidable opponent.
goals: To serve justice, assist those in need, and combat evil.
relations: Might be encountered alongside other dragons, good-aligned creatures, or adventurers who seek its favor.
environment: High, snowy mountains where it can survey vast landscapes.
strengths: Possesses powerful breath weapons, including a freezing blast and a paralyzing gas, immunity to cold damage, and formidable physical and magical abilities.
weaknesses: Highly reliant on its breath weapons and spells; if these powers are disabled, it may struggle in prolonged engagements.
attacks: Multiattack with a bite, claw, and tail attacks; can utilize Frightful Presence to instill fear.
most_powerful_ability: Breath weapons that include a powerful freezing blast and a paralyzing breath affecting multiple foes at once.
senses: Blindsight up to 60 feet and darkvision up to 120 feet, giving a passive perception of 21, making it difficult to approach stealthily.
skills: Noteworthy skill proficiencies in arcana, history, and perception, combined with high Charisma enhances its effectiveness in various encounters.
additional_information: Legendary Resistance allows it to negate failed saving throws three times a day.
Cloud Strider ability grants immunity to nonmagical damage and increased fly speed in cloud form.
Can shapeshift into humanoid or beast form while retaining some dragon abilities.
Has access to legendary actions that can influence the dynamics of battles.
Possesses a Freezing Fog ability affecting creatures within a close radius.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting allows it to cast charm person, faerie fire, awaken, and geas up to three times per day.
